description: Used for Step 2 of TaValidator certification. Meant to be sent from a pending TaValidator to the GNodeFactory (Gnf), so the Gnf will transfer its ValidatorCert to the pending TaValidator's Algorand address.

AlgoAddressStringFormat.description: String of length 32, characters are all base32 digits.

ValidatorAddr.title: The address of the pending TaValidator

HalfSignedCertTransferMtx.title: Algo multi-transaction for certificate transfer, with 1 of 2 signatures

Axiom1.title: Is correct Multisig
Axiom1.description: Decoded HalfSignedCertTransferMtx must have type MultisigTransaction from the 2-sig MultiAccount [GnfAdminAddr, ValidatorAddr].

Axiom2.title: Transfers correct certificate
Axiom2.description: - The transaction must be the transfer of an Algorand Standard Asset - It must be getting transferred from its creator, which must be the 2-sig Multi [GnfAdmin, TaValidatorAddr] - It must be getting sent to the ValidatorAddr -The ASA must have: - Total = 1 - UnitName=VLDITR - GnfAdminAddr as manage - AssetName and - Url not blank. - The transfer amount must be 1

Axiom3.title: TaValidator has opted in
Axiom3.description: ValidatorAddr must be opted into the transferring ASA.

Axiom4.title: TaValidator has sufficient Algos
Axiom4.description: ValidatorAddr must have enough Algos to meet the GNodeFactory criterion.

Axiom5.title: TaValidator has signed
Axiom5.description: ValidatorAddr must have signed the mtx.
